Corner of the Eye.name: Corner of the Eye
Corner of the Eye.flavor: Illusory sounds and flickering shadows make empty space appear menacing and dangerous.
Corner of the Eye.effect: The burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies treat the zone as difficult terrain and grant combat advantage to melee and close attacks while within the zone. While the zone lasts, you can perform the following actions:

Deadly Visions.flavor: You implant horrifying images in your enemyâ€™s mind and blood, besieging their psyche.
Deadly Visions.effect: Make an at-will attack against a single target. If the attack hits, it deals 2d10 extra damage and the target suffers debilitating hallucinations (save ends). Until the target saves, it grants combat advantage and chooses at the start of its turn each round whether to take 10 psychic damage or be dazed until the start of its next turn.
Deadly Visions.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.
